items.name: Candle
items.inRoomDescription: There is a candle stick lying on the ground. It seems to have a slight glow although it is not lit.

items.name: Bedroll
items.description: You look inside the bed and find a mysterious key...
items.inRoomDescription: Although covered in dirt, you notice an empty bedroll at your feet.

items.name: Strange Key
items.description: The key is in the shape of a pumpkin ...
items.inRoomDescription: On the table you see an odd looking key.
